alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:26PM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Clarke, Washington and Choctaw Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, pastureland becomes flooded. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. Old Ferry Road near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 27.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.2 feet Thursday morning. It will then rise to 30.2 feet Thursday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
